description.value:
Activate 2 Interact

Pale fade is a white ointment with a sharp, earthy scent. The poison rapidly desiccates flesh, which then crumbles and forms a cloud of pallid dust. If the victim is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed] by this poison, then the cloud of dust also conceals other creatures from the victim.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:42]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[10d6[poison]] and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[12d6[poison]], drained 1, and concealed (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[15d6[poison]], drained 1, and concealed (1 round)
